name: Quake Rocketeer
description:
This game was made for the Mix and Game Jam with the theme DIMENSION CHANGE, this game took "rocket jumping" from Quake and made a 2D game  out of it.

CONTROLS: A and D/Left and Right to move sideways, W/Up/Space to jump, Mouse 1 to shoot

Special thanks to the Mix and Jam Discord server for Motivation and fun.
